findings.details: Added a focus-visible outline on blog list entries to strengthen keyboard navigation without affecting hover styling.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan for http:// and placeholder domains in templates/pages/posts found none.
Added BlogPosting description meta on listing entries to strengthen structured data consistency.
Excerpts are stripped/trimmed consistently across listing views.

recommendations: Run a full external link checker when network access is available
Consider adding structured descriptions to older posts that lack excerpts
